body_html: Thank you very much for providing a fix for this issue! Note that it may not be the perfect way to solve this issue, because it depends on whether or not CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE matches "Debug", and this CMake variable is usually not set (or "not meaningful") for Visual Studio projects. See https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.10/variable/CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE.html However, we will give it a try :-)

body: Thank you very much for providing a fix for this issue! Note that it may not be the perfect way to solve this issue, because it depends on whether or not CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE matches "Debug", and this CMake variable is usually not set (or "not meaningful") for Visual Studio projects. See https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.10/variable/CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE.html However, we will give it a try  :-)
